StringListProperty.Name: HmFields
StringListProperty.Description: Defines mapping rules from C/C++ resource IDs to help IDs. A map field has the following format: 'ID_,HID_,10000' where the last number is the offset between the C/C++ and help IDs.

StringProperty.Name: CmFile
StringProperty.Description: C/C++ header file (.h) containing resource IDs to be mapped to help IDs.

StringProperty.Name: HmFile
StringProperty.Description: Help map file (.hm) containing help IDs mapped from C/C++ resource IDs.
